column4: Does anybody know of good flash-based music players that work w/Linux?  I noticed latest rhythmbox has some type of iPod option, what exactly does that do?
CharosZ3RO - installing gstreamer0.8-mad (I think that's the package) from universe should do the trick
rhythmbox doesn't work with my ipod, gnupod-tools does.  *read README carefully though*
sorry, for putting songs on/off and playlists, for playing no reason rhythmbox shouldn't work.
